title: Toolset discovery accepts Team Explorer SKU
body:
See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45760787/trying-to-build-nuget-package-with-vs-2017-team-explorer-installed, pointed out by @dasMulli in https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/issues/2369#issuecomment-323581649.

We should consider having a special case for Team Explorer--even if it carries a copy of MSBuild, I can't think of a reason someone would want to use that copy.

nodes.body: I think this was resolved by https://github.com/microsoft/MSBuildLocator/pull/76.
